subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Lamont Hamilton scored 19 points and Anthony Mason Jr. had a career-high 17 to help St. John’s beat Maryland-Baltimore County, 78-57, on Friday night.
snippet: Lamont Hamilton scored 19 points and Anthony Mason Jr. had a career-high 17 to help St. John’s beat Maryland-Baltimore County, 78-57, on Friday night.
